topic.title: Applying Customer-Specific Branding (optional)
topic.shortdesc: You can optionally apply customer-specific branding by including a branding tarball.

body.p: For more information on creating the branding tarball, see the instructions in the wrs-branding-1.0.0.tgz in the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade SDK tarball.
The branding tarball can be applied at various stages. The steps for each stage are described below.

note.p: The recommended method is to install the tarball before running the controller configuration script.

ol.li: Log into the active controller using the CLI.
Delete any previous tarball from the /opt/branding directory.
Copy the new branding tarball to the /opt/branding directory.

Install the branding.
To install the branding as part of initial system configuration, run the configuration controller script.
If you have already run the controller configuration script, you can install the branding as follows:
Ensure that any previous tarballs are deleted from the /opt/branding directory.
Ensure that the new branding tarball is copied to the /opt/branding directory.
Execute the following command:
sudo service horizon restart
This processes the branding files on the active controller.
Lock the inactive controller.
Unlock the inactive controller.
